news.title: Singapore court charges Hotel Properties owner with obstructing justice
news.para: ​​Ong Beng Seng, the 78-year-old owner of Hotel Properties Ltd and rights holder to the Singapore Grand Prix Formula One race, is accused of giving high-value gifts to ex-minister S. Iswaran, who on Thursday became the first former cabinet member to be jailed in Singapore.

news.title: Develop plan to make office buildings in Arera Hills: Madhya Pradesh CM
news.para: He highlighted that the area will soon benefit from a metro facility and an improved road network. To enhance convenience for employees and the general public, Yadav emphasised the development of infrastructure with a focus on walk-to-work facilities near workplaces.

news.title: Goa SEAC approves sand mining permits for Mandovi and Zuari rivers
news.para: “The permission for sand extraction by manual means should be 70-30% between the traditional and the non-traditional extractors,” SEAC said. It has directed the DMG to issue permits to individuals to carry out 1,000 m³ of sand mining per year in 14 different zones across these rivers.

news.title: Rajasthan HC directive exposes gaps in Rajasthan Township Policy Act 2010
news.para: According to the Act, the govt grants completion certificates after developers submit a certificate from registered chartered engineers. Town planners have raised concerns about the potential conflict of interest arising from the fact that these engineers are hired or sometimes even directly employed by the builders.

news.title: Trichy corporation to conduct special camp for UGD connections
news.para: The local body has asked applicants to bring property tax payment receipts. Based on the location of the property, it will calculate the user fee and deposit to obtain for the new UGD connection.

news.title: Telangana HC grants anticipatory bail to HMDA official in HYDRAA case
news.para: Justice Juvvadi Sridevi gave the order while hearing the anticipatory bail plea filed by Sudheer Kumar who feared arrest after an FIR was lodged against him following a complaint by Hyderabad Disaster Response and Assets Monitoring and Protection Agency (HYDRAA) a month ago.

news.title: Coimbatore residents raise concerns over new apartment redevelopment rules
news.para: Builders are hopeful that the new rules under the Tamil Nadu Apartment Ownership Act, 2022, would streamline redevelopment of old buildings and simplify day-to-day functioning of apartment complexes.

news.title: SAMHI Hotels acquires ITHPL for about Rs 2,050 million in Bengaluru
news.para: Ashish Jakhanwala, chairman & managing director of the company, "This transaction aligns with our growth strategy, which focuses on turnaround opportunities in large office and aviation markets."

news.title: Maharashtra government offers 1.33 FSI incentive for rental housing in Dharavi redevelopment
news.para: Mumbai's Dharavi redevelopment faces a setback due to litigation, with only 50 acres of salt pan land available for rental housing. The state plans to offer Floor Space Index (FSI) incentives to developers and has allowed the Dharavi Redevelopment Project to buy land outside the notified area. The developer, Adani Realty, holds 80% equity in the project.

news.title: No building plan nod if layout isn’t approved: Bengaluru civic body
news.para: The BBMP chief commissioner said in the order that even if land records have already been registered for converted land, building construction permission shouldn't be granted for such plots if there is no approval for a single plot/layout development plan from the competent authority.

news.title: HC issues notice to Haryana government over revived S+4 floor policy
news.para: The Public Interest Litigation (PIL) petition — challenging the construction of four-floor buildings with stilt parking in Gurgaon — has been submitted by a resident of Sushant Lok.

news.title: Noida: Amrapali Leisure Valley told to shut down illegal borewells in 15 days
news.para: The society was also fined Rs 5 lakh after about 50-60 unauthorized borewells were found to have been installed by villa owners. Amrapali Leisure Valley Society consists of approximately 800 villas, with 700 of them already handed over to the buyers.

news.title: Piramal Capital & Housing Finance sells property in Mumbai for Rs 187 crore to Shoquba Realty
news.para: In a separate regulatory filing, the company also said that it has raised $150 million through a global bond sale. The bonds will be issued at a yield of 7.80 per cent and will have to be repaid in 3.32 years.

news.title: Government issues new quality standards for construction materials
news.para: The quality control orders (QCOs) will be rolled out on a staggered timeline, allowing additional time for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs) to comply with the new standards.

news.title: Piramal Capital and Housing Finance raises $150 million from bond sale
news.para: The bonds will be issued at a yield of 7.078 per cent and will have to be repaid in 3.32 years, according to a company statement. The company, a wholly-owned subsidiary of Piramal Enterprises, had raised USD 300 million from a sustainability bond issuance in July this year.

news.title: Delhi court grants bail to senior official of Avantha Group in PMLA case
news.para: The Rs 500 crore money laundering case is being probed by the Enforcement Directorate (ED). Special Judge Sanjeev Aggarwal granted relief to Madhav Acharya, noting that he had already spent four months and 18 days in judicial custody.

news.title: Godrej Properties' sale bookings up 3% to nearly Rs 5,200 crore in Q2 FY25
news.para: The company's sales booking value grew 89 per cent YoY to over Rs 13,800 crore. This was achieved through the sale of more than 8,600 homes with a total area of over 14 million square feet.

news.title: Office leasing to record 70 million sq ft across nine cities in 2024: Report
news.para: The office sector witnessed a gross absorption of 53.8 million sq ft during January to September 2024 across nine cities, recording a 19% year-on-year growth.

news.title: Macrotech Developers reports 21% growth in pre-sales in Q2 FY25
news.para: The company has posted pre-sales of Rs 83 billion in the first half of FY25. The pre-sales growth in the first half of the financial year is 21% year-on-year.

news.title: Boson Whitewater partners with Biome Environmental for indirect potable water reuse project in Bengaluru
news.para: The project produces 6.4 lakhs litres of potable drinking water per day. It is energy-efficient using just 0.25 units of electricity per 1,000 litres.
